content.question: If Nigerian politicians wanted to follow the advice of this article, which of the following would be the first step to be taken?

choices.label: The Nigerian Senate would vote to censure the president.
The Nigerian Supreme Court would try the president on the charge of abuse of power.
Members of the National Assembly would vote to impeach the president.
The vice president would use the authority of that office to remove the president.

content.answer: Members of the National Assembly would vote to impeach the president.
